name: adminAuth
title: Admin Authentication
description: Authentication routes and middleware for an admin section within the API

matchAdmin.description: A regular expression that matches URLs that are part of the admin section of the API and need protection (defaults to "^/api/admin")

authMountPoint.description: The URL at which the admin auth section has been mounted (defaults to "/api/admin/auth")

allowAll.description: Whether to run off restrictions entirely (never use in production!)

tablePrefix.description: Prefix used for all admin auth tables

sessionLength.description: Length of the admin sessions, in minutes (defaults to 60)

resetTokenLifetime.description: Lifetime of a reset token, in hours (defaults to 24)

clientResetLink.description: The reset page on the client side (e.g., "/admin/reset-my-password")

resetTokenStyle.description: The style of the reset link on the client side ("slug" to append the token as a slug, or "query" to send it in the query string as "token")

userFields.description: List of fields the admin users should have, other than those required for this feature

includeUserRoutes.description: Flag for whether the user create/edit/update/etc routes should be included

allowSessionsListRoute.description: Flag to allow a route for showing all active admin sessions

allowBootstrapRoute.description: Flag to allow a route for bootstrapping an admin auth user

secretBootstrapPassword.description: Secret bootstrap password for use with the bootstrap route
